channel.title: Galaxy X 718
channel.description:
[CENTER][url=http://galaxyxscape.org]Homepage[/url]||[url=http://galaxyxscape.org/forums/]Forums[/url]||[url=http://www.galaxyxscape.org/webclient.php]Webclient[/url]||[url=http://galaxyxscape.org/client.jar]Desktop Client[/url]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/UIyT3AD.gif[/img] To start out with this update, I would like to just say sorry for the amount of time since the last update.
With this update me and Gir sat down and thought what we would want to accomplish from all of the suggestions and the results of the voting from the [url=http://"http://galaxyxscape.org/forums/index.php?/topic/578-suggestions/"]Suggestions[/url] thread. What we have come up with is that there will not be just one major update, and it will be eased in a little bit at each update.
We have decided to choose Varrock as are main city. Varrock will be the home area for now on: [img]http://i.imgur.com/tyqnl2c.png[/img]
Some of the object and npcs that used to be at home have been moved also.
The PKing, Pure, and Potion shops have been moved to Edgeville.
The Altar of Zaos is in the Varrock Church on the second level, and the usual altar is in the church on the main floor. All the other shop NPCs are in their correct spots. Bob is in Lumbridge, in his shop.
Gir has been working on a Minigame that deals with Hunter. To play talk to the Hunting Expert at the Hunter teleport. You need atleast 43 Hunter and can not be wielding a weapon or a shield.
[img]http://i.imgur.com/EOAJZFU.png[/img]
Another update that Gir worked on was Gambling. You are able to gamble away from 10k-10m gp at the most. [img]http://i.imgur.com/DCQMfQn.png[/img]
Two brand-new Bosses have been added, but are currently still in BETA. Me and Gir are looking for possible drops for the two bosses. [img]http://i.imgur.com/eXIGuaw.png[/img][img]http://i.imgur.com/4aamH5s.png[/img]
The command to claim votes has been changed to ::claim from ::votes.
Clicking on the players online where the Report Abuse is normally located will open up the players online list. The list has been lengthened to be able to show a max of 300 players.
Thieving has been moved from home and a teleport has been added the the skilling teleport dialogue. [img]http://i.imgur.com/chzB3Qv.png[/img]
Like I said above this update is one of many to come in the future that will be moving this community closer to the full world usage. In this update we are introducing the full usage of the Loadstone Network. As a default, the Varrock loadstone is activated due to the home being at varrock. [img]http://i.imgur.com/DVu8iga.png[/img]
The second Update of many to give the full world usage is Tormented Demons. To get to Tormented Demons threw the basement of the Lumbridge Kitchen then threw the hole in the wall. Also a bank chest has been placed in the basement. [img]http://i.imgur.com/3Sxargi.png[/img]
The next update is for voting once you have voted by doing ::vote claim your reward by doing claim [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/n7zrSeP.jpg[/img]
As well as donators can now chose there title and design it as they wish! They can make up there own name, own color own shadow and if they would like the name before or after there original name! [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/PwMnkfX.jpg[/img]
Would you like a signature to show how good you are ingame? Our high score signature updates your stats as you train! [IMG]http://www.galaxyxscape.org/hiscores/sig-patrick.jpg[/img] [url=http://www.galaxyxscape.org/hiscores/sig-yourusername.jpg]http://www.galaxyxscape.org/hiscores/sig-yourusername.jpg[/url]
As well as our new beta loader currently under construction [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/2lu4e8p.png[/img]
So come on guys come join and vote for rewards! [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/210x991.jpg[/img]
In future updates more bosses will be changed to the full effect, minigames, and some quests are in the works of being planned. A thread will be posted at a later date for the community to be able to post story lines that we could write a quest on.[/CENTER]

item.title: Galaxy X 718
item.dc:creator: @rossy319 rossy319
item.description:
@rossy319 wrote:

[quote=“Potzon, post:5, topic:507078”]I’ve never seen a 100% working lodestone network on a RSPS, and neither the hunter minigame.
If you really have added this, then good luck with your server. :)[/quote]

Yeah I added loadstone working 100% there are a lot more updates but were still a new server so if you want join and see it as it begins to develop.

Read full topic

I’ve never seen a 100% working lodestone network on a RSPS, and neither the hunter minigame.
If you really have added this, then good luck with your server.

item.title: Galaxy X 718
item.dc:creator: @rossy319 rossy319
item.description:
@rossy319 wrote:

[CENTER]Homepage||Forums||Webclient||Desktop Client


To start out with this update, I would like to just say sorry for the amount of time since the last update.

With this update me and Gir sat down and thought what we would want to accomplish from all of the suggestions and the results of the voting from the Suggestions thread. What we have come up with is that there will not be just one major update, and it will be eased in a little bit at each update.

We have decided to choose Varrock as are main city.
Varrock will be the home area for now on:

tyqnl2c.png766×497

Some of the object and npcs that used to be at home have been moved also.

The PKing, Pure, and Potion shops have been moved to Edgeville.

The Altar of Zaos is in the Varrock Church on the second level, and the usual altar is in the church on the main floor. All the other shop NPCs are in their correct spots. Bob is in Lumbridge, in his shop.

Gir has been working on a Minigame that deals with Hunter. To play talk to the Hunting Expert at the Hunter teleport. You need atleast 43 Hunter and can not be wielding a weapon or a shield.

EOAJZFU.png759×493

Another update that Gir worked on was Gambling. You are able to gamble away from 10k-10m gp at the most.

DCQMfQn.png765×498

Two brand-new Bosses have been added, but are currently still in BETA. Me and Gir are looking for possible drops for the two bosses.

The command to claim votes has been changed to ::claim from ::votes.

Clicking on the players online where the Report Abuse is normally located will open up the players online list. The list has been lengthened to be able to show a max of 300 players.

Thieving has been moved from home and a teleport has been added the the skilling teleport dialogue.

chzB3Qv.png755×495

Like I said above this update is one of many to come in the future that will be moving this community closer to the full world usage. In this update we are introducing the full usage of the Loadstone Network. As a default, the Varrock loadstone is activated due to the home being at varrock.

The second Update of many to give the full world usage is Tormented Demons. To get to Tormented Demons threw the basement of the Lumbridge Kitchen then threw the hole in the wall. Also a bank chest has been placed in the basement.

The next update is for voting once you have voted by doing ::vote claim your reward by doing claim

As well as donators can now chose there title and design it as they wish! They can make up there own name, own color own shadow and if they would like the name before or after there original name!

Would you like a signature to show how good you are ingame? Our high score signature updates your stats as you train!

http://www.galaxyxscape.org/hiscores/sig-yourusername.jpg

As well as our new beta loader currently under construction

2lu4e8p.png768×529

So come on guys come join and vote for rewards!

210x991.jpg950×439

In future updates more bosses will be changed to the full effect, minigames, and some quests are in the works of being planned. A thread will be posted at a later date for the community to be able to post story lines that we could write a quest on.[/CENTER]
